Database - Class in Model
The Database class provides methods to interact with database hosted by AWS for saving and retrieving game data

Constructs a new Database object and establishes a connection to the database

Test class for Database

deleteAll() - Method in class Model.KlotskiModel
Delete all the games of the logged user
deleteAllGames() - Method in class Model.Database
Deletes all games associated with the logged-in user
deleteGame(String) - Method in class Model.Database
Delete the game with the corresponding name, nothing happened if the game_name doesn't exist
deleteSavedGame(String) - Method in class Model.KlotskiModel
Delete the game with that name, if not found the database call doesn't do anything
